name: BOTTLE
description: THERE IS A SMALL BOTTLE SITTING ON THE FLOOR.

name: RUG
handler_if_first_noun: YOU CAN'T, THE RUG STRETCHES ALL THE WAY ACROSS THE ROOM.

name: DOOR
handler_if_first_noun: THE CARVINGS ON THE DOOR SAY, "DO NOT ENTER."
YOU'LL HAVE TO GO TO THE EAST SIDE OF THE ROOM TO DO THAT.

name: FOOD
description: THERE IS FOOD HERE.

name: STATUE
description: THE STATUE IS FACING THE EAST DOOR.

name: STATUE
description: THE STATUE IS FACING THE WEST DOOR.

name: RING
description: A RING OF FINEST GOLD IS HERE.

name: SWORD
description: THERE IS A LARGE SWORD LAYING NEARBY.

name: GARGOY
description: THERE IS A HIDEOUS STONE GARGOYLE PERCHED ON A LEDGE ABOVE THE NORTH PASSAGE.
handler_if_first_noun: THERE APPEARS TO BE DRIED BLOOD ON HIS CLAWS!

name: ALTAR
description: BEFORE YOU STANDS AN ALTAR, STAINED WITH THE BLOOD OF COUNTLESS SACRIFICES.

name: IDOL
description: A GOLDEN IDOL STANDS IN THE CENTER OF THE ROOM.

name: GATE
description: GREAT BRONZE GATES ENGRAVED WITH IMAGES OF SERPENTS STAND SILENTLY BEFORE YOU.
handler_if_first_noun: THE GATES ARE LOCKED, YOU CAN NOT OPEN THEM.
THE GATES ARE TOO SMOOTH TO CLIMB.

name: LEVER
description: A BEJEWELED LEVER IS ON ONE WALL.
handler_if_first_noun: A TRAP DOOR OPENS ABOVE YOU.  GOLD DUST FILLS THE ROOM AND DROWNS YOU.

name: LEVER
description: A BEJEWELED LEVER IS HERE.
handler_if_first_noun: THE LEVER CAN NO LONGER BE PULLED.

name: PLAQUE
handler_if_first_noun: UNTOLD RICHES LIE WITHIN REACH, HERE- TO ANY KNOWING, LIVING CREATURE. BE WARY THOUGH, NO MATTER WHAT THY CREED, THAT THOU HARNESS AND LIMIT THY POWERFUL GREED.  PULL THE LEVER TO GAIN THY WEALTH, BE PREPARED TO ...
description: THERE IS A PLAQUE ON THE WALL ABOVE THE LEVER.

name: CANDLE
description: A CANDLE IS IN THE ROOM.
handler_if_first_noun: THE CANDLE IS NOW BURNING, A SWEET SCENT PERMEATES THE ROOM.

name: CANDLE
description: A CANDLE IS BURNING DIMLY.
handler_if_first_noun: YOU REALLY SHOULD PUT IT OUT FIRST.
handler_every_turn: THE LIGHT FROM THE CANDLE SEEMS TO BE GROWING DIMMER.

name: PLAQUE
handler_if_first_noun: INTO THE TUNNEL ENTERS THE SEEKER, BRAVELY AND WISELY HE GOES. FOR HE WILL RECOGNIZE THE REAPER, AS THE LIGHT BEFORE HIM GLOWS.
description: THERE ARE CRYPTIC RUNES ABOVE THE TUNNEL.

name: LAMP
description: THERE IS A BURNING LAMP HERE.
handler_if_first_noun: THE LAMP GOES OUT. YOU MUST HAVE RUBBED IT THE WRONG WAY!
THE LAMP IS COVERED WITH TARNISH AND YOU CAN'T READ IT.

name: SERPEN
description: A LARGE SERPENT LIES COILED ON THE FLOOR.
handler_if_first_noun: SINKS TO THE HILT IN THE SERPENT'S SCALY BODY!
THROWS A SHOWER OF SPARKS AS IT GLANCES OFF THE WALL!
THE SERPENT'S HEAD IS SEVERED FROM HIS BODY! A MAGNIFICENT BLOW!
handler_every_turn: STRIKES, POISON COURSES THROUGH YOUR VEINS!
COILS RAPIDLY AROUND YOU AND CONSTRICTS!

name: SERPEN
description: A LARGE DEAD SERPENT LIES ON THE FLOOR.

name: COIN
description: THERE IS A COIN ON THE GROUND.

name: SLOT
description: THERE IS A TINY SLOT CUT IN THE NORTH WALL.
handler_if_second_noun: IS TOO BIG TO FIT IN SUCH A TINY SLOT.
THE STATUE TURNS TO FACE THE WEST DOOR.

name: PLAQUE
description: THERE IS A MESSAGE CARVED UNDER THE SLOT.
handler_if_first_noun: THE MESSAGE SAYS, "SAFE PASSAGE FOR A PRICE."

name: DOOR
description: THE DOOR IS CLOSED.

name: DOOR
description: THE DOOR IS STANDING OPEN.

name: PLAYER
on_death_handler: YOU PASS OUT. WHEN YOU AWAKEN, YOU FIND YOURSELF CHAINED TO A BLOOD STAINED ALTAR. A PRIEST IS KNEELING OVER YOU WITH A KNIFE. IT LOOKS LIKE THIS IS IT.

name: GARGOY
description: THERE IS A HIDEOUS GARGOYLE BLOCKING THE NORTH PASSAGE.
handler_if_first_noun: HE'LL EAT YOU LONG BEFORE YOU'LL EAT HIM!
handler_every_turn: THE GARGOYLE GORES YOU WITH HIS HORN AND RIPS YOUR GUTS OUT!
THE GARGOYLE CLAWS YOU ACROSS THE CHEST!
YOU FEEL THE GNASHING OF THE GARGOYLE'S TEETH IN YOUR SIDE!
THE CLAWS OF THE GARGOYLE RIP THROUGH YOUR ARM IN AN ATTEMPT TO REACH YOUR BODY!
THE GARGOYLE LUNGES AT YOUR FACE BUT YOU PULL BACK.  HE BITES YOUR SHOULDER INSTEAD!
on_death_handler: THE GARGOYLE TAKES A FINAL BREATH AND THEN EXPIRES.

name: GARGOY
description: THERE IS THE DEAD CARCASS OF AN UGLY GARGOYLE NEARBY.
handler_if_first_noun: UGH! I THINK I'M GOING TO BE SICK!

name: WALL
handler_if_first_noun: YOU CAN NOT CLIMB THE WALL, IT IS TOO SMOOTH.

name: VINE
description: A LARGE NETWORK OF VINES CLINGS TO THE WALL.

name: CHOPST
description: THERE IS A GOLDEN CHOPSTICK HERE.

name: GUARD
description: SEVERAL GUARDS CARRYING LETHAL CROSSBOWS TURN TO FACE YOU.
handler_every_turn: "STOP! INFIDEL DOG!", THE GUARDS LEVEL THEIR CROSSBOWS AND LOOSE THEIR BOLTS! YOUR BODY FALLS TO THE GROUND RIDDLED WITH THE SHAFTS!

name: GEM
description: THERE IS A PRECIOUS GEM HERE.

name: ROOM
handler_if_first_noun: YOU DISCOVER A PRECIOUS GEM HIDDEN IN A CREVICE.

name: LAMP
description: THERE IS A LAMP HERE.
handler_if_first_noun: WHO DO YOU THINK YOU ARE, ALADDIN?

name: PIT
handler_if_first_noun: THERE IS NO WAY AROUND THE PIT.

name: ALTAR
handler_if_first_noun: YOU CAN NOT MOVE THE ALTER FROM BENEATH IT, IT IS TOO HEAVY.

name: AMBIENT SOUNDS
handler_every_turn: YOU HEAR THE DISTANT CRIES OF WILD ANIMALS.
YOU ARE DOUSED BY A BRIEF TROPICAL RAIN SHOWER.
